author: {'steamid': '76561199010042150', 'num_games_owned': 3874, 'num_reviews': 2454, 'playtime_forever': 21, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 21, 'last_played': 1681340983}
review:
I am 32 years old.

My ex-wife and I have a daughter together, and we adopted our son together. Both are now 4 years old.

When we were going through our separation, I felt lost and unhappy. I was self-destructive. One day, I was so angry with everything spiraling out of control that I punched a concrete wall in a moment of overwhelming emotion. This resulted in breaking my fifth metacarpal in my right hand—the hand I worked with, played games with, and used to carry my children to bed—the hand I desperately needed to ensure I could continue providing.

Upon learning the severity of the self-inflicted damage, I became almost suicidal. Keep in mind that just a few months before this, I was the happiest man, with no history of depression or anxiety. I had never experienced anger outbursts, nor was I the type to break down and cry, but I was in a tough situation that truly prevented me from seeing the light on the other side.

With nothing better to do, I looked for a game I could play WITH ONE HAND while recovering. Somehow, I stumbled upon this game and read some of the comments. I decided it was worth a try... I must admit I didn't beat the game, nor did I play as much as some of you. In fact, I may have played this game for only a day or two. That being said, after doing so, I had a new joy and hope for life. I managed to leave behind the pain and suffering that had been thrust upon me. I could experience the joy and happiness of other people. I relaxed for 5 ♥♥♥♥ minutes listening to this music, long enough to realize that I would be okay.

After realizing this, I turned off the game and went back to work. My hand hurt a lot, but I was motivated. I stopped feeling so sorry for myself and became the father I needed to be at that moment, not the weak boy I was behaving like.

Today, I am close friends with the mother of my children. We don't fight, argue, or say hurtful things to each other. We are parents and friends.

Now I have 3 children. My third child is, wait, ALSO 4 YEARS OLD. The woman I am with was going through a very similar situation at the time of my separation, and we just unexpectedly stumbled into each other's lives. We have been dating for a year and are very happy together.

Moral of the story: you never know what life has in store for you, and if I had given up when all odds were against me, I wouldn't be where I am today. This silly little game helped me realize that.

Thank you.

author: {'steamid': '76561198336397313', 'num_games_owned': 4985, 'num_reviews': 762, 'playtime_forever': 202, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 7, 'last_played': 1681353343}
review: Kart düşürmek dışında bir işe yaramayan VR oyunu. Kesinlikle tavsiye etmiyorum. 3 boyutlu görünümünde gibi ama baktığında sanki oyuncu olarak Tanrı modundayız etraf çok küçük görünüyor. Bunu geçtim ateş hissiyatı çok garip ve sol arka taraftan gelen uzaylıları bazen karanlıktan dolayı göremiyoruz. Oyunda ayarlar bölümünü bulamadım. Uzaylı sizi bir kere ısırdı mı hemen ölüyorsunuz bu sebepten tek bir can hakkınız var; droplar çok saçma yerde düşebiliyor önünüze düşmesi gerekiyor ki alabilesiniz. Evet fiyatına göre anca böyle oyun çıkabilir, kart düşürme olayı olmasa herkes iade ederdi eminim.

author: {'steamid': '76561198027865082', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 35, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 35, 'last_played': 1607120262}
review:
its really not good by 2020 standards. 

Very basic wave shooter with simple weapons, auto reload, easy enemies, no real story. You sit there and kill everything. Took me 35 minutes to finish the whole game, including a bathroom brake and replaying the first of three chapters multiple times to figure out if there is recoil and which weapon is the best.

Today you can implement this very basic wave shooter in Unity and some asset store packages quite easily. There are free VR games on steam that do it better than this.

author: {'steamid': '76561198211390004', 'num_games_owned': 1259, 'num_reviews': 188, 'playtime_forever': 77, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 57, 'last_played': 1596730281}
review:
"The Purge Day" ist zwar nur ein Waveshooter, aber was man hier für poppelige 3 Euro geboten bekommt ist schon sehr ordentlich. Die Erde wird mal wieder von grimmigen Aliens heimgesucht, und wir wurden auserkoren die Invasion zurückzuschlagen.
https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2184300595
Grafisch kann es sich für das Geld wirklich sehen lassen, und der Sound ist auch OK. Es gibt 3 Kapitel, welche jeweils in 7 Wellen aufgeteilt sind. Nach jeder Welle können wir eine neue Waffe, Munition, Zeitbomben oder Handgranaten kaufen... wenn das Geld denn reicht. Nach ein paar Runden hat man dann auch raus welche Waffe man wann kaufen muß. Dadurch wird das Spiel zwar sehr leicht, macht aber trotzdem eine Menge Spaß. Das Spiel ist sein Geld mehr als Wert.

author: {'steamid': '76561198979820225', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 7, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 5, 'last_played': 1564038096}
review: Ok. Fun but pretty dated by now. It feels very 2016. If you are looking for a cheap wave shooter and are not too fussy about graphics you might enjoy this. The aliens are pretty freaky when they come up close.

author: {'steamid': '76561197994222878', 'num_games_owned': 2475, 'num_reviews': 75, 'playtime_forever': 15, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 15, 'last_played': 1520827750}
review: I just got bored playing this. Enemies slowly walk towards you. Shoot them until they die. If they touch you, you die. It handles well and there's nothing 'wrong' with the game, but there's just nothing to it. When it comes to VR, if it's not engaging enough to at least slightly distract you from the hunk of plastic hanging off your face, then it's just annoying to play.

author: {'steamid': '76561198066590240', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2800, 'playtime_forever': 10, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 10, 'last_played': 1503548706}
review:
I got this on sale.  Glad I didn't pay full price.  Game starts off really nice with a nice story book intro.  Then you're stuck with a stationary wave shooter.  

That wouldn't be so bad if it were semi-interesting, but the enemy types are pretty uninspired.  They just walk slowly towards you.  The aiming seems odd too with a targeting reticle always in the distance.  Throwing a grendate is also very weird.  

Just a very bland game overall.  There's so many wave shooters and this one is just average to below average honestly.  

I played this with Oculus Rift and Touch contollers do work.  

Rating 4/10 bleh

author: {'steamid': '76561197972416553', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 253, 'playtime_forever': 68, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 68, 'last_played': 1503428322}

author: {'steamid': '76561198134258060', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 70, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 70, 'last_played': 1502184998}
review: 这款游戏算是站桩塔防游戏，一共3张地图，每张地图回合数不同，每回合开始前有武器准备。整体游戏不难，武器系统不复杂，几元钱入手消遣一下，还是很爽的。（具体如何通关是需要摸索的）

author: {'steamid': '76561197961017729', 'num_games_owned': 3005, 'num_reviews': 3428, 'playtime_forever': 274, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 197, 'last_played': 1710234310}
review: Pretty awkward and bad. It's a stationary shooter, and you're exposed to strange polygonal creatures that come at you from the distance. The first level (I could not complete) had aliens, which was nice, but they just come at you, and if they touch you once your dead. The game is therefore you making sure they all get shooted in the head from a distance, and you have to use a bad non-VR conducive cross hair. Ideally, the game would be better, and more dynamic, and you'd aim down the sights like a real gun, like every other VR shooter does. [spoiler]Reminds me of Area 51 from back in the day, but that game was better.[/spoiler]

review:
Got it in a cheap bundle, but had an eye on this game before. The marketing did a great job designing the store page, indeed. The game itself is average VR mediocracy. Install -> play for some minutes -> uninstall. Do not further bother, it is not worth your time, especially with some really good games we got in the recent months for our Vive.
Even for the cheap price I cannot recommend the game as it is just another - and not a good one - Wave shooter.

[i] Twitch Channel : https://www.twitch.tv/mrorange55
Youtube Channel : https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC1UE5TPoF0HX0HVpF_E4uPQ/videos?view_as=subscriber [/i]

review:
Paid $4.00 for a bundle of 10 VR games so 40 cents for this game and I still feel ripped off. Looked promising with the cartoon story start, once into gameplay turned into a pile of mutilated cow shit. Not the worse VR game but just unneeded in the sea of VR mediocrity

author: {'steamid': '76561197985170232', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 42, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 42, 'last_played': 1485483683}
review:
Nettes Spiel für den kleinen Geldbeutel

Habe das Spiel schon länger und muss sagen am Anfang wenig Begeisterung. Seit dem Update mit Touch-Support macht es aber richtig Spaß. Die Bewegungserkennung funktioniert einwandfrei. Grafik ist nicht High End aber gut. Die Story ist sehr kurz und passt zum sehr geringen Preis. Steam-Errungenschaften erhöhen allerdings den Wiederspielwert. 

Fazit: Für 3 Euro wird man kaum ein Spiel finden das so viel Spaß macht.

author: {'steamid': '76561197974765747', 'num_games_owned': 868, 'num_reviews': 362, 'playtime_forever': 37, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 37, 'last_played': 1485465968}
review:
I bought this game after the update to support the VIVE. This is a very basic wave shooter with a story if you want to call it that. You kill mobs and then can buy ammo, guns, grenades, and bullet time. This game probably won't really get people too excited as it doesn't take much skill to play it. That is saying someting coming from myself who likes things fairly simple and non-complex in VR but since the devleper didn't insult us with a high price it may be deemed as something worth $2.99. My main gripe with it right now is it is very short. More chapters would be welcomed and I hope the developer is working on a content update. If we had a number rating I might give it a 5/10. But that would be pushing it. I am going to keep this in my library as it is something to show people in VR that wouldn't be too hard for first timers and younger kids. I am going to recommend this to die-hard wave shooter fans but as it is now it is not very challenging. Just something to play if you don't have a lot of time and like aliens. Also, I do believe this game was originally developed for smart phone VR then ported to Rift then made for VIVE. 

Video of first time full run through using VIVE motion controllers. Enjoy. 

https://youtu.be/Hqk1muowofg

author: {'steamid': '76561197970543589', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 24, 'playtime_forever': 9, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 9, 'last_played': 1482384816}
review: It's not a great game but for a cheap price it's fun enough, especially if you don't have motion controls/room scale. The Purge Day is a great one to let your friends try out VR without getting into an hour+ game session.

author: {'steamid': '76561198262383376', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 95, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 95, 'last_played': 1480079043}
review: Very cool horror shooter. The last chapter is really frightening.
